name: ZeroScssNpmScripts
description: Super lightweight boilerplate for frontend development (scss, npm scripts)

scripts.start: touch src/scss/utilities/utilities.scss && touch src/scss/base/normalize.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SimoNonnis/CssUtilityClasses/master/utilities.css > src/scss/utilities/utilities.scss && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/necolas/normalize.css/master/normalize.css > src/scss/base/normalize.scss
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/main.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js

author: Simon Nonnis
